Name: Peppermint Mocha
Description: I can too make it! In your face, Haley!

DescriptionLocalization.es: ¡Yo también puedo hacerlo! ¡En tu cara, Haley!
DescriptionLocalization.ko: 나도 만들 수 있다고! 이거나 먹어라, 헤일리!
DescriptionLocalization.de: Ich kann es auch herstellen! Schau dir das an, Haley!
DescriptionLocalization.hu: Én is el tudom készíteni! Ezt kapd ki, Haley!
DescriptionLocalization.ja: やったぜ！してやったりだヘイリー！
DescriptionLocalization.pt: Eu também posso fazê-lo! Na sua cara, Haley!
DescriptionLocalization.ru: Я тоже так могу! Выкуси, Хэйли!
DescriptionLocalization.zh: 我当着你的面做出它了！海莉！
